General.Name: China Glaze Co Ltd
General.Description: China Glaze Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic glaze materials. The company offers frits, pigments, ameloblasts, zirconium silicates, print glazes, vetrosa glazes, and digital inks. It also provides building construction materials, such as crystal glass; ceramic tiles; and photoelectric and nano materials. China Glaze Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 136, Chung Hsing Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 31061
